#### Biden to vow nursing home crackdown as part of State of the Union

 **[Washington Post](https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/2022/02/28/biden-nursing-home-crackdown-covid/?utm_campaign=wp_to_your_health&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&wpisrc=nl_tyh&wpmk=1&pwapi_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..08YJSX9z4j68zbuXwOO6AVZIdDRg4DvekZbA8s63G54)** 

* "The nursing home industry has warned that the pandemic has exacerbated long-running staffing shortages, citing data that roughly 420,000 employees in nursing homes and long-term care facilities have departed over the last two years."
